mapper.select: INSERT INTO orders ( phone, city, street, house, flat, entrance , floor, checkres , status_id ) VALUES ( #{phone}, #{city}, #{street}, #{house}, #{flat}, #{entrance}, #{floor} , #{checkres},#{statusId} ) RETURNING order_id AS id, created_at AS createdAt, status_id AS statusId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dishesfromorder ( order_id , dish_id , count ) VALUES ( #{order_id} , #{dish_id}, #{count} )
mapper.select: UPDATE orders SET status_id = #{status_id} WHERE order_id = #{order_id};
